product_name: Surftech Generator Bamboo Stand Up Paddle Board - 11' 6"
long_description: Beginner to intermediate paddlers will appreciate this well-balanced paddle board. It's planing shape cruises nicely on flat water but won't back down when you want to play in the surf.
short_description: Beginner to intermediate paddlers will appreciate this well-balanced paddle board. It's planing shape cruises nicely on flat water but won't back down when you want to play in the surf.
